generated_body: The article titled "What Happens When Your Cruise Has to Rescue Another Ship" is likely to explore the logistical and operational challenges involved when a cruise ship responds to an emergency involving another vessel. Readers may expect a detailed account of maritime protocols, the roles of crew members during such incidents, and potential impacts on passengers' experiences. Additionally, the article could discuss past instances of cruise ships executing rescues, highlighting safety measures and the broader implications for maritime travel. This topic may also delve into the humanitarian aspects of such rescues, although specifics will depend on the article's focus.
